name: Z.A.T.F.E
description:
Z.A.T.F.E is a small and incomplete metroidvania made by me and my friend Citron-Rouge for the Metroidvania Month 3. In this game, you play as a badass in heavy futuristic armor shooting energy bullets at everything... well it would be the case if the game what finished.

Controls :

WASD = Move
J = Change Element
K = Shoot
L = Jump
Enter = Pause

This game is also combatible with gamepad using direct input.

Warning : the game is a bit janky at parts, if you have a problem like an object vanishing before being collected, exit and enter the room again to make it respawn.
